original_text: For you had compassion on those in prison, and you joyfully accepted the plundering of your property, since you knew that you yourselves had a better possession and an abiding one.
korean_text: 너희가 갇힌 자를 동정하고 너희 소유를 빼앗기는 것도 기쁘게 당한 것은 더 낫고 영구한 소유가 있는 줄 앎이라

sentences.original_text: For you had compassion on those in prison,
and you joyfully accepted the plundering of your property,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 재산이 약탈당하는 것도 기쁘게 받아들였으니,

sentences.original_text: that you yourselves had a better possession
sentences.korean_translation: 자신들이 더 좋은 소유를 가지고 있으며,
